column5: Newly Remodeled 2 bedroom 2 bath Will be ready by Friday 06/09/17 Great to get around everywhere in New Braunfels!  Full 2 bedroom 2 bath apartment. 5 minutes from Schlitterbahn. 2 minutes from Landa Park Also by one of the largest springs. 5 Minutes from the river. Perfect spring break or summer affordable spot! 6 miles from Gruene!
